snippet: Mr. Cruz again kept to his carefully crafted debate plan, but he also addressed the idea that his polished performances could make him seem difficult to relate to.
abstract: Sen Ted Cruz's onstage criticism of CNBC moderators of third Republican presidential primary debate was part of his strategy of maintaining self-control and avoiding directly attacking his rivals; Cruz has in his campaign so far adhered to carefully constructed playbook that prioritizes getting his message across to voters at every available opportunity.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cruz again kept to his carefully crafted debate plan, but he also addressed the idea that his polished performances could make him seem difficult to relate to.

headline.print_headline: Cruz Sticks to the Script, Ignoring His Opponents
headline.main: Ted Cruz Sticks to Script, Ignoring Rivals and Aiming to Engage Viewers
